text: Ray Moore is an American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.182 & 187. Driving a Chevrolet-powered 1940 Willys dubbed Chicken Coupe, Davis, p.187. he won NHRA's B/GS national championship at Indianapolis Raceway Park in 1961. His winning pass was 11.76 seconds at .Davis, p.182. ==References== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, pp. 182 & 187\. Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers
title: Ray Moore (drag racer)
